name: FNF - Vs. Brightside Full Week
description:
VS Brightside is a mod which adds a whole new week with 5 songs, 2 new characters, full animated cutscenes, and based on KadeEngine, with it's own modifications including a counter for ratings and your highest combo.

CeramicSkinStudios (They deserve all the credit, seriously!): https://youtube.com/c/CeramicSkinStudios

NOTE: This mod has flashing lights and imagery that viewers may find disturbing. Discretion is advised!
